attributes.action: Stop People Pay Road Tax while Locked Down
attributes.additional_details: From the first day the government announced the lockdown l lost my job as self employed. But still paying road tax even I haven’t drove my car since then. So why me like many other millions paying that sum of money. Please stop people pay road tax backed from March till September 2020.
attributes.background: Because of COVID-19 most people are lockeddown and asked to stay home to stop the spread of the virus. I am one of these people who lost their jobs and staying home while the lock down is still going. I haven’t drove my car since then and paying my road tax. Stop road tax from March till September.
